dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 7950 IH: City of Atlanta Stormwater Management Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Williams of Georgia introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend the Water Resources Development Act of 1992 to increase funding for stormwater management for Atlanta, Georgia, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the City of Atlanta Stormwater Management Act.
Section 219(e)(5) of the Water Resources Development Act of 1992 (106 Stat. 4835; 110 Stat. 3757; 113 Stat. 334) is amended by striking $25,000,000 and inserting $75,000,000.
